# GitHub Repository Configuration

## Repository Description
Free open-source tool to migrate from 1Password to Apple Passwords. Export .1pux files to Apple Passwords CSV format with zero data loss. Cross-platform Python script.

## Short Description (350 chars max)
Migrate from 1Password to Apple Passwords in minutes. Free, open-source Python tool converts .1pux exports to Apple Passwords CSV format. Export passwords, credit cards, secure notes & attachments. Works on macOS, Windows & Linux. Zero dependencies.

## Website URL
https://github.com/[yourusername]/1PasswordExporter
